attributes.action: Make World of Warcraft free on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of kids around the UK are addicted to World of Warcraft but cannot afford it, they go into withdrawal and even in some extreme cases, suicide. World of Warcraft is the leading cause of under 18 year old suicides according to a recent survey.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
